statements: SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions;
SELECT acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE deal_type = 'Merger';
SELECT transaction_date, deal_type, acquirer_company FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE deal_value >= 100000000 ORDER BY deal_value DESC;
SELECT acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value, transaction_date FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE deal_type = 'Acquisition';
SELECT acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY deal_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE acquirer_company LIKE 'A%' AND target_company LIKE '%Inc%';
SELECT transaction_id, acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT acquirer_company, target_company, deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE deal_value > 1000000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE deal_value > 10000000;
SELECT transaction_date, company_name FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY trend_start_date;
SELECT trend_description, trend_category FROM market_trends WHERE trend_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT company_name, deal_type FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE deal_type = 'Merger'
SELECT AVG(deal_value) AS average_deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions
SELECT company_name, transaction_date FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, acquirer_company_id, target_company_id FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions WHERE deal_value > 1000000;
SELECT transaction_date, deal_value FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, headquarters_location FROM acquirer_companies WHERE total_assets > 50000000;
SELECT * FROM target_companies ORDER BY current_valuation DESC;
SELECT * FROM merger_and_acquisition_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, industry, headquarters_location FROM acquirer_companies WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT company_name, current_valuation FROM target_companies ORDER BY current_valuation DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT acquirer.company_name AS acquirer_name, target.company_name AS target_name, merge.deal_value FROM acquirer_companies AS acquirer JOIN merger_and_acquisition_transactions AS merge ON acquirer.acquirer_company_id = merge.acquirer_company_id JOIN target_companies AS target ON target.target_company_id = merge.target_company_id WHERE merge.deal_value > 5000000;

SELECT acquirer.company_name AS acquirer_name, target.company_name AS target_name, merge.transaction_date FROM acquirer_companies AS acquirer JOIN merger_and_acquisition_transactions AS merge ON acquirer.acquirer_company_id = merge.acquirer_company_id JOIN target_companies AS target ON target.target_company_id = merge.target_company_id WHERE target.industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM Acquisition ORDER BY deal_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT acquirer_name, target_name, deal_size FROM Acquisition WHERE deal_size > 1000000;
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM DealParticipants WHERE participant_role = 'Investor';
SELECT deal_value, market_segment FROM DealMetrics WHERE deal_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY deal_value DESC;
SELECT market_segment, deal_count, total_deals_value FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE deal_count > 10;
SELECT acquirer_name, target_name, deal_size, deal_date FROM Acquisition ORDER BY deal_date DESC;
SELECT deal_id, deal_value, market_segment, deal_status FROM DealMetrics WHERE deal_status = 'Completed';
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM DealParticipants WHERE deal_id IN (SELECT deal_id FROM DealMetrics WHERE market_segment = 'Technology');
SELECT acquirer_name, target_name, deal_size, deal_date FROM Acquisition WHERE deal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY deal_size DESC;
SELECT market_segment, sum(deal_count) AS total_deals, sum(total_deals_value) AS total_value FROM MarketAnalysis GROUP BY market_segment ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM mergers;
SELECT id, company_name, deal_type FROM mergers WHERE deal_value > 1000000;
SELECT acquirer_name, country FROM acquirers WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT advisor_name, advisor_type FROM deal_advisors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT acquiree_name, industry, country FROM acquirees WHERE industry = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM mergers;
SELECT company_name, deal_type, deal_value FROM mergers WHERE deal_value > 1000000 ORDER BY deal_value DESC;

SELECT mergers.company_name, acquirers.acquirer_name, acquirees.acquiree_name FROM mergers JOIN acquirers ON mergers.company_name = acquirers.acquirer_name JOIN acquirees ON mergers.acquiree_name = acquirees.acquiree_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deals, industry FROM acquirees GROUP BY industry HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_deals DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT advisor_name, company_name, country FROM deal_advisors WHERE advisor_type = 'Legal' ORDER BY company_name ASC, country DESC;
